alert.note: Alert for Lower Brewster County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 2:08PM CDT until March 19 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts possible in the higher elevations. * WHERE...Lower Brewster County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Difficult travel conditions are possible, especially in the highest terrain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452- 9292.
